title: Hiromitsu Isogai
text:
is a former <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. He played for <a href="Japan%20national%20football%20team">Japan national team</a>.
Club career.
Isogai was born in <a href="Uki%2C%20Kumamoto">Uki</a> on April 19, 1969. After graduating from <a href="Tokai%20University">Tokai University</a>, he joined <a href="Gamba%20Osaka">Gamba Osaka</a> in 1992. He played as regular player from first season. He moved to <a href="Urawa%20Reds">Urawa Reds</a> in 1997. He retired in July 1998.
National team career.
In January 1995, Isogai was selected by the <a href="Japan%20national%20football%20team">Japan national team</a> for the <a href="1995%20King%20Fahd%20Cup">1995 King Fahd Cup</a>. At this competition, on January 6, he debuted against <a href="Nigeria%20national%20football%20team">Nigeria</a>. On January 8, he also played against <a href="Argentina%20national%20football%20team">Argentina</a>. He played two games for Japan in 1995.
